Twister


*Twister looks at Sinesis*

Twister: It seems that we have someth=
ing in common and I need a partner too.

*Twister extends her hand to Sines=
is*

Twister: Partner?

*Twister asks Sinesis with her hand extended*

  --=
--- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Se=
nt: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:45 PM
  Subject: Re: NBW


  "Traveling alone=
, though? What about all the bots we killed together? What about all of the=
 times we took shots for each other? It's horribly not fair. I wish I had a=
 partner still." Sinesis said. He looked closer at Twister.

  "Hey, will y=
ou be my partner?" Sinesis askes Twister...
    ----- Original Message ----=
- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday,=
 August 04, 2000 4:38 AM
    Subject: Re: NBW


    Twister/Blizzard/Infect=
ra



    *Twister looks at the sword and sighs*

    Twister: I'll have to=
 get used to the fact that, my sister has a life too and I'll have to learn=
 to travel alone....

    *Twister sighs and slowly and gentley places the =
energon eagles into her arm compartment*


    *Blizzard looks at Sinister =
and smiles*

    Blizzard: I wonder what's happening back at the base.



 =
   *Infectra smiles back at Airbomber*

    Infectra: I trust the both of y=
ou......I did trust the others but....

    *Infectra sighs*

    Infectra:=
 I need to stop thinking of things that upset me. But, it's hard to thinl o=
f the good times because there were hardly none.

    *Infectra says to Air=
bomber and grins*


      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE=
 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:20 AM=

      Subject: Re: NBW


      Sinesis frowns. He holds up his brothers sw=
ord.

      "He left this here, without it, what shall he do? We have simul=
ar problems. I just wish I still had him by my side." Sinesis said to Twist=
er.

      Sinister held Blizzards hand, illegal fireworks shooting off in =
his eyes.

      Stranato calls out.

      "Hey, any Maximals here?" He ye=
lls through the base. Airbomber sits down and looks to Infectra. He smiles.=


      "Hopefully, the Maximals will listen to us, they must know of the o=
ccurences happening. I trust Stranato, he's always been good. Well, maybe h=
e hasn't always been good, but he's good now." Airbomber said to Infectra. =
He laughed at his words...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        Fr=
om: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday=
, August 03, 2000 11:44 PM
        Subject: Re: NBW


        Twister/Blizz=
ard/Infectra



        *Twister looks at Sinesis*

        Twister: I've d=
ecided to let my sister be...For she's my sister and I love her too much to=
 pull her away from the she loves....

        *Twister opens her arm compa=
rtment and pulls out a two small pieces of energon both shaped like an eagl=
e*

        Twister: Our parents gave us both one to unite us as sisters an=
d friends forever and always help each other. I found Blizzard's on the gro=
und in front of the base. I doubt she dropped it by accident.....

        =
*Twister holds out to Sinesis so he can see*



        (OOC: Ack! I meant =
The Team Ultima Base! My bad, Sorry.)

        *Blizzard skips out of the c=
ave and walks next to Sinister for The Team Ultima Base and holds her hand =
out wanting Sinister to hold her hand*



        *Infectra follows Stranat=
o and Airbomber into the Maximal Base*


          ----- Original Message -=
---- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          =
Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:59 PM
          Subject: Re: NBW


      =
    Sinesis sighs and stares at Twister. (Sorry about earlier.)

          =
Sinister frowns when he sees Blizar walking toward the Maximal base.

     =
     "Where are you going? And can I come?" Sinister asked.

          Stra=
nato and Airbomber stop at the Maximal base, since they were never set on e=
nemy and never betrayed the Maximals, they went on in...
            ----- =
Original Message ----- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
            To: =
nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:46 PM
   =
         Subject: Re: NBW


            Infectra/Wrath/Blizzard/Twister


 =
           *Infectra follows Stranato and Airbomber towards the Maximal Bas=
e*



            *Wrath gets into a CR Chamber when he arives at the Maxim=
al Base awaits his repairs*



            *Blizzard does a little skip out=
 of the cave walks next to Sinister for the Maximal Base and holds her hand=
 out towards his wanting to hold hands with him*



            (OOC: Twist=
er is out near the Maximal Base but I'm making her come back anyway.)

    =
        *Twister leaves the location of the Maximal Base seeing as how ever=
yone was else where and went back to Team Ultimas Base and sits at the same=
 table as Sinesis*

            Twister: I don't know what I'm going to do.=
...I end up here thinking I'll find a nice Team where I'm wanted and me and=
 my sister could be sisters and friends...I was such a fool for believing s=
uch happiness could happen.....

            *Twister puts her double sided=
 sword away stares at the table*


              ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
              From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    =
          Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:27 PM
              Subject: NB=
W


              Stranato and Airbomber walked toward the Maximal base.

 =
             Gangon, still dying.

              Deemos and Inzola confront=
 one another several times, but Inzola always runs from Deemos.

          =
    Etchingar called out to Megatron.

              "Hey, do I got the job=
?" He asked.

              Time Bomb waited patiently and Land Mine was he=
aled now. Land Mine looked around, looking to meet Megatron.

             =
 Sinister came out of the cave (Hopefully with Blizzard.) and started back =
toward Team Ultima's base.

              Sinesis was healed and sat down n=
ext to Twister...
